roleset.name: turn a whole into many small pieces

example.name: the one example
example.text: Further fractioning the late-night audience is the addition of the ``Arsenio Hall Show,'' syndicated by Paramount Communications Inc.
example.arg: the addition of the ``Arsenio Hall Show,'' syndicated by Paramount Communications Inc
